Author: omouse
Content: I think I can. If not, I'll just switch to something else. In any case, I need some experience with web.py and Python so this is a good exercise.

Author: wordsthatendinq
Content:
http://gfxcontests.com - offer a nominal reward to get several people to submit designs in a competition.

I found out about these guys through MashupCamp 3, which was run by Mass Event Labs. Mass Event Labs offered $100 for a logo design and got many entries actually, check out the discussion at http://gfxcontests.com/showthread.html?t=713

Author: yaacovtp
Content: They were bought by google and are closed to new users while they go through the google intergrate and then kill process.
